name: Index Of Winter
description:
A boy named Kerri wants to be a Superhero on christmas, unfortunately the wish didn't come true but next christmas under his tree outside he found a gloves. They were too cold that he couldn't take them to his hands. So he took it to fireplace and then he realized the gloves are giving him something special...

Collaboration:
